name: Garlic Toasts with Red Pepper Aioli (Giada De Laurentis)
ingredients: 1/2 cups roasted red bell peppers, drained, patted dry
instructions: Drizzle oil over the bread slices.
Arrange bread on a baking sheet.
Bake until bread is crisp and golden, about 5 minutes.
Immediately rub garlic cloves over the hot toasts.
Finely chop garlic in food processor.
Add peppers and blend until almost smooth.
Blend in the mayo with the machine running, blend in the oil.
Season the aioli to taste with salt and pepper.
The aioli can be make 2 days ahead, cover and refrigerate.
Serve the aioli over the toasts and serve.
